nodes.body: {ðŸ“¼ video} The new "Coming Soon" Trailer for Bring It On! made by Matthew Sinclair is out now! [Watch it here](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6OVPCsZc1E0)!

{!header} Changes are happening on this very site! If you hadn't noticed, check out the [Developer Directory](https://axolstudio.github.io/STLGameDevRoundUp/directory/) & [Project Showcase](https://axolstudio.github.io/STLGameDevRoundUp/showcase/) sections! Consider adding yourself/your project(s) if you are part of our community/area!
